statements: SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' ORDER BY gene_expression DESC;
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM genomics_data WHERE pathway_activity = TRUE ORDER BY pathway_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_expression FROM genomics_data WHERE pathway_name = 'XYZ' ORDER BY gene_expression ASC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression > 50 AND pathway_activity = TRUE;
SELECT pathway_name, COUNT(*) AS gene_count FROM genomics_data GROUP BY pathway_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY gene_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression > 10 ORDER BY pathway_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression < 5 AND pathway_activity = TRUE
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND pathway_activity = FALSE ORDER BY gene_expression DESC
SELECT DISTINCT pathway_name FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name, gene_expression FROM genomics_data WHERE pathway_activity = TRUE ORDER BY gene_expression ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM GenomicsData;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM GenomicsData WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GenomicsData WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gene_id, pathway_id FROM GenomicsData ORDER BY pathway_id DESC;
SELECT target_id, target_name FROM DrugTargets WHERE gene_id = 2 AND pathway_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GenomicsData WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM GenomicsData WHERE pathway_id = 5;
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM GenomicsData WHERE gene_id = 3 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT target_name, pathway_name FROM DrugTargets JOIN GenomicsData ON DrugTargets.pathway_id = GenomicsData.pathway_id WHERE gene_id = 2;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_targets, pathway_name FROM DrugTargets JOIN GenomicsData ON DrugTargets.pathway_id = GenomicsData.pathway_id GROUP BY pathway_id HAVING total_targets > 3 ORDER BY total_targets DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data;
SELECT gene_name, gene_expression FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression > 10;
SELECT sample_id, gene_name FROM genomics_data ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_targets WHERE pathway_id = 3;
SELECT pathway_name, genetic_pathways.pathway_id, target_name FROM genetic_pathways JOIN drug_targets ON genetic_pathways.pathway_id = drug_targets.pathway_id;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name = 'TP53';
SELECT gene_name, gene_expression FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_expression > 5 ORDER BY gene_expression DESC;
SELECT gd.sample_id, gd.gene_name, gp.pathway_name FROM genomics_data gd JOIN genetic_pathways gp ON gd.pathway_id = gp.pathway_id WHERE gd.pathway_id = 1;
SELECT dt.target_name, gp.pathway_name FROM drug_targets dt JOIN genetic_pathways gp ON dt.pathway_id = gp.pathway_id WHERE dt.target_name LIKE '%kinase%';

SELECT gd.gene_name, dt.target_name, gp.pathway_name FROM genomics_data gd JOIN drug_targets dt ON gd.pathway_id = dt.pathway_id JOIN genetic_pathways gp ON gd.pathway_id = gp.pathway_id WHERE gd.gene_expression < 3 AND dt.target_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY gd.gene_expression ASC;
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, target_id FROM Drugs WHERE target_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, target_name, gene_name FROM Drugs JOIN DrugTargets ON Drugs.target_id = DrugTargets.target_id JOIN Genes ON DrugTargets.gene_id = Genes.gene_id;
SELECT drug_name, target_name, gene_name FROM Drugs JOIN DrugTargets ON Drugs.target_id = DrugTargets.target_id JOIN Genes ON DrugTargets.gene_id = Genes.gene_id WHERE GeneName LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT pathway_name, COUNT(*) AS GeneCount FROM GeneticPathways JOIN Genes ON GeneticPathways.pathway_id = Genes.pathway_id GROUP BY pathway_name ORDER BY GeneCount DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticPathways
SELECT gene_name, pathway_name FROM Genes INNER JOIN GeneticPathways ON Genes.pathway_id = GeneticPathways.pathway_id
SELECT target_name, gene_name, pathway_name FROM DrugTargets INNER JOIN Genes ON DrugTargets.gene_id = Genes.gene_id INNER JOIN GeneticPathways ON Genes.pathway_id = GeneticPathways.pathway_id

SELECT DISTINCT Drugs.drug_name, DrugTargets.target_name, Genes.gene_name, GeneticPathways.pathway_name FROM Drugs INNER JOIN DrugTargets ON Drugs.target_id = DrugTargets.target_id INNER JOIN Genes ON DrugTargets.gene_id = Genes.gene_id INNER JOIN GeneticPathways ON Genes.pathway_id = GeneticPathways.pathway_id
SELECT * FROM Drugs ORDER BY target_id DESC, drug_name ASC
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM pathway;
SELECT * FROM drug WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT variant_type, effect FROM genetic_variant WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, target_gene_id FROM drug ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression WHERE expression_level > 5 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE gene_id=1;
SELECT pathway_name, description FROM pathway WHERE pathway_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT drug_name, effect FROM drug JOIN genetic_variant ON drug.target_gene_id = genetic_variant.gene_id;
SELECT drug_name, gene_name FROM drug JOIN drug_target ON drug.drug_id = drug_target.drug_id WHERE drug_target.gene_id = 5;
